sentences.english: Inhale stretch the arms up in a circular motion.
sentences.chinese: 吸氣伸展手臂從體側畫圓向上。

sentences.english: The soldier stood with his hands by his sides.
sentences.chinese: 那名士兵雙手貼住體側站立。

sentences.english: With your hands and arms at your side and the ball firmly under the attacking arms armpit.
sentences.chinese: 手和手臂垂於體側，球牢靠地置於攻擊手腋下。

sentences.english: The hands at the sides allow for easier body undulation.
sentences.chinese: 手在體側時可讓身體的波動更容易些。

sentences.english: All he had left was his sidearm.
sentences.chinese: 一切，他已經離開了他的體側。
